task_history.summary: Implemented blockchain verification system for payment transactions. Created BlockchainMonitorService using ethers.js to verify transactions on-chain (recipient, token, amount). Integrated verification into PATCH endpoint - now requires tx_hash and verifies before allowing CONFIRMING/COMPLETED status. Prevents payment fraud via fake transactions. All 15 blockchain tests passing.

Implemented complete webhook CRUD API with 5 endpoints (create, list, get, update, delete). All 31 tests passing with 85.86% coverage. Webhook secrets auto-generated, bcrypt-hashed, and only shown once. HTTPS-only URLs enforced. Ownership verified on all operations.

Strengthened password policy from weak (8 chars, uppercase, number) to industry best practices (12 chars, uppercase, lowercase, number, special char). Created comprehensive test suite with 29 passing tests covering all requirements, error messages, and edge cases. Updated all integration tests and API documentation with new password requirements and examples.
